caption:
This photograph captures an industrial setting with environmental implications. The primary focus is a series of large plumes of smoke or steam billowing from tall stacks at an industrial plant, dominating the skyline against a slightly overcast sky. The smoke, dense and gray, contrasts starkly with the lighter clouds in the background.

In the foreground, the image shows a quiet road lined with utility poles and wires, which leads towards the industrial facility. Vehicles are visible on the road; they appear to be typical of mid-20th-century models, suggesting an earlier era, potentially the 1970s or 1980s. On the right side of the road, there's a green street sign for "River Ridge Rd" and "W.A. Chico," adding a locational detail to the scene.

The industrial complex itself features multiple large structures, including towers and interconnected pipes or scaffolding, characterizing it as possibly a chemical plant or a refinery. The atmosphere created by the image reflects a blend of daily life going seemingly unaffected under the looming presence of heavy industry.
title: The Du Pont chemical plant at Belle pollutes the early morning air.
